bibl.title: A New Bithynian Month List.
bibl.note: P. Coll. priv√©es [ed.: D. MONTSERRAT, A Fragment of a Monastic Duty Roster?, BASP 27 (1990) pp. 163-168, 1 pl.]. The remains interpreted in ed. pr. as a list of personal names are recognizable as Bithynian month names. It may be a possibility that this fragment formed part of a Latin-Greek glossary, or of a handbook or collection of miscellanea.
REA John R., A New Bithynian Month List.
